Constructor Detail

SessionCookieConfig

public SessionCookieConfig(java.lang.String domain,
                           java.lang.String path,
                           java.lang.String comment,
                           boolean isHttpOnly,
                           boolean isSecure)
Constructor.

If isHttpOnly is true, any session tracking cookies configured by this SessionCookieConfig will be marked as HttpOnly, by adding the HttpOnly attribute to them. HttpOnly cookies are not supposed to be exposed to client-side scripting code, and may therefore help mitigate certain kinds of cross-site scripting attacks.

If isSecure is true, any session tracking cookie configured by this SessionCookieConfig will be marked as secure, even if the request that initiated the corresponding session is using plain HTTP instead of a secure protocol such as HTTPS. If isSecure is false, any session tracking cookie configured by this SessionCookieConfig will be marked as secure only if the request that initiated the corresponding session is also secure.

Parameters:
domain - The domain assigned to any session tracking cookie configured by this SessionCookieConfig
path - The path assigned to any session tracking cookie configured by this SessionCookieConfig, or null if the context path of the ServletContext with which this SessionCookieConfig has been associated is to be used as the cookie path
comment - The comment assigned to any session tracking cookie configured by this SessionCookieConfig
isHttpOnly - true if any session tracking cookies configured by this SessionCookieConfig will be marked as HttpOnly, false otherwise
isSecure - true if any session tracking ccokie configured by this SessionCookieConfig will be marked as secure even if the request that initiated the corresponding session is using plain HTTP instead of HTTPS, and false if any session tracking cookie configured by this SessionCookieConfig will be marked as secure only if the request that initiated the corresponding session is also secure
See Also:
Cookie.setDomain(String), Cookie.setPath(String), Cookie.setComment(String), Cookie.setHttpOnly(boolean), Cookie.setSecure(boolean), ServletContext.setSessionCookieConfig(javax.servlet.SessionCookieConfig)

isHttpOnly

public boolean isHttpOnly()
Checks if any session tracking cookies configured by this SessionCookieConfig will be marked as HttpOnly.

Returns:
true if any session tracking cookies configured by this SessionCookieConfig will be marked as HttpOnly, false otherwise
See Also:
javax.servlet.http.Cookie#isHttpOnly(boolean)

isSecure

public boolean isSecure()
Checks if any session tracking cookie configured by this SessionCookieConfig will be marked as secure even if the request that initiated the corresponding session is using plain HTTP instead of HTTPS.

Returns:
true if any session tracking cookie configured by this SessionCookieConfig will be marked as secure even if the request that initiated the corresponding session is using plain HTTP instead of HTTPS, and false if any session tracking cookie configured by this SessionCookieConfig will be marked as secure only if the request that initiated the corresponding session is also secure.
See Also:
Cookie.getSecure(), ServletRequest.isSecure()
